name: profilarr
description: Profilarr is a self-hosted automation tool for managing Plex libraries and related services like Sonarr and Radarr. It allows defining scanning and repair tasks through a web UI.
features: Library automation: Automate Plex library scanning, maintenance, and optimization tasks.
Sonarr integration: Connect with Sonarr to manage TV show quality profiles and library organization.
Radarr integration: Integrate with Radarr for movie quality management and automated upgrades.
Quality profiles: Define and enforce quality standards across your media library automatically.
Scheduled tasks: Configure automated scanning, repair, and optimization on custom schedules.
Web interface: Manage all automation tasks through a clean, intuitive web dashboard.
Media analysis: Analyze library content for quality issues, missing metadata, and optimization opportunities.
Upgrade automation: Automatically replace lower-quality media with higher-quality versions when available.
Notification system: Receive alerts when tasks complete, errors occur, or manual intervention is needed.
Custom rules: Create custom automation rules based on file size, quality, codec, and other criteria.
Batch operations: Perform bulk operations on library content for efficient management.
Activity logging: Track all automation activities with detailed logs for troubleshooting and auditing.
